title: Honda unveils two '0 Series' EV concepts in CES 2024, will be launched in 2026
description: CES 2024: Honda revealed the "Honda 0 Series," an upcoming electric vehicle (EV) series scheduled for a global launch in 2026. The announcement featured two concept models, Saloon and Space-Hub. Embracing the "Thin, Light, and Wise" philosophy, the series aims to redefine EV development with an innovative approach, focusing on design, performance, and user experience.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
